name: MineField (itch) (DeathCatThor)
description:
Welcome to the Endless Mine field that has no an end, so reach the nonexistent end!

CONTROLS

Arrow keys - Move

OBJECTIVE

Survive. That is it. Mines are bad. enough said.

AND NOW A MESSAGE FROM MINES INC.

"this has and end, really it does, no seriously don't look at the reviews. There are none, everybody dies lol" - Person, Manager of Mines Inc.
